sectionHeading: Weekend Events / Traffic Impacts for May 18 - 19

day: Lane Closures Scheduled for I-75N at 117.5 MM (northern 75/64 split):
event: 8 p.m. Friday May 17 thru 6 a.m. Monday May 20 (24 hrs/day).

day: Lane Closures Scheduled for I-75N at 117.5 MM (northern 75/64 split):
event: Center and left lanes will be blocked just before the northern split for asphalt repair.  The right lane will remain open.

day: Lane Closures Scheduled for I-75N at 117.5 MM (northern 75/64 split):
event: Expect significant delays if traveling in this area.

day: Closures Scheduled for New Circle Rd at Newtown Pike:
event: 7 p.m. Friday May 17 to 6 a.m. Monday May 20 (24 hrs/day).  Closures as follows:

day: Closures Scheduled for New Circle Rd at Newtown Pike:
event: The outer loop right lane and the exit ramp from the outer loop to inbound Newtown Pike.

day: Closures Scheduled for New Circle Rd at Newtown Pike:
event: The inner loop right lane and the exit ramp from the inner loop to inbound Newtown Pike.

day: Closures Scheduled for New Circle Rd at Newtown Pike:
event: Motorists may use the Georgetown Rd exit to access inbound Newtown Pike.
